mapper.select: SELECT sc.SUBCTGRID, sc.CTGRID FROM SUBCATEGORY sc LEFT JOIN CATEGORY c ON c.CTGRID = sc.CTGRID WHERE sc.SUBCTGRID = #{subctgrId}

SELECT sc.subctgrName AS categoryName, SUM(CASE WHEN p.projectStatus IN ('SUCCESS','SETTLED') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS successCnt, SUM(CASE WHEN p.projectStatus = 'FAILED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS failCnt FROM subcategory sc LEFT JOIN project p ON p.subctgrId = sc.subctgrId WHERE sc.ctgrId = #{ctgrId} GROUP BY sc.subctgrName ORDER BY sc.subctgrName
